review:
We went for hip fracture treatment for my 67 yr old mother to Dr.Venkatramanan swaminathan.dr was very kind and helpful in educating the issue.He was very patient and kind to explain all our queries.
The surgery was too long due to complications but doctor was successful with the surgery 
and my mother is alright now yet to start walking.
Glad to have met Dr.venkataramanan who is a senior surgeon in orthopedics who had resolved our pain and fears . Thankful to Dr.
Please checkin and consult doctor for all orthopedic issues.

Suffering from chronic lower back ache was finding difficult to walk, drive or sit for a prolonged time was referred to the great doctor Venkataraman Swaminathan . MRI study report revealed disc dessication of lumbar spine L4-L5/L5-S1.  I was asked to practise two pain relieving exercise and three spine strengthening exercise . Just in span time of three days I became normal and able to move around , sit and travel without any pain. Doctor very patiently explained the problem and was really helpful. I would really recommend the doctor for patients with acute back ache. Thank you Dr,Venkataraman

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Venkataraman Swaminathan, Orthopaedic Specialist, Apollo Hospitals OMR , Chennai, had successfully done the Total Hip Replacement Surgery for me at the critical situation when I was immovable with severe pain He was kind enough to take the time to explain the surgery and how it could work. I am very thankful to him and his dedicated physio team. His expert care and constant concern have quickened my recovery time.In addition to being an outstanding doctor, he is also a remarkable person.I appreciate his constant encouragement and caring spirit that has made me walk around with self- confidence.His expertise skill is most indispensable for many patients who suffer from joints and bone problems. I wish God to render a Heathy Long life to him to serve the community
